justification: Ignores Team B’s stated values: they prize workhorse RBs and possession WRs yet are asked to give them up for a dual-threat QB (they prefer pocket passers) and an injured deep-threat WR. B already has a Tier 1 QB, so Derek White adds little. Mason Mitchell’s questionable status clashes with B’s injury caution. Trade guts B’s RB core and offers no stack benefit. Rationale is vague and mislabels ‘stability’; acceptance probability is unrealistic.
